price: 你们当谨守许多拜功，和最中间的拜功，你们当为安拉而服从地立正。
arabic: حَٰفِظُواْ عَلَى ٱلصَّلَوَٰتِ وَٱلصَّلَوٰةِ ٱلۡوُسۡطَىٰ وَقُومُواْ لِلَّهِ قَٰنِتِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: ḥāfiẓū ʿalā al-ṣalawāti wal-ṣalati al-wus'ṭā waqūmū lillahi qānitīna
